meanings.definition: A light-sensitive pigment found in the retina of the eye.
meanings.sent1: Rhodopsin helps us see in the dark by reacting to light.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that rhodopsin is crucial for our night vision.
meanings.sent3: When rhodopsin goes on vacation, we struggle to see clearly in dim light.
meanings.sent4: In the darkness, rhodopsin becomes our superhero, guiding us through the night.
meanings.sent5: The image of rhodopsin absorbing light is imprinted in my mind.

meanings.definition: A protein that is essential for vision in low-light conditions.
meanings.sent1: Rhodopsin is like a special tool our eyes use to see in the dark.
meanings.sent2: Without enough rhodopsin, our ability to see at night diminishes.
meanings.sent3: I told my friend that rhodopsin is the secret ingredient for night vision.
meanings.sent4: In the dimly lit room, rhodopsin works tirelessly to help us see.
meanings.sent5: The magic of rhodopsin allows us to navigate the darkness with ease.
